alert.note: Alert for Bexar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 11:54PM CDT until April 11 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BEXAR COUNTY... At 1153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Government Canyon State Natural Area, or 10 miles south of Boerne, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Shavano Park, Cross Mountain, Leon Springs, The Dominion, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Grey Forest, Fiesta Texas, Scenic Oaks, and San Geronimo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
